title: Christian admonitions against the tvvo fearefull sinnes of cursing and swearing most fit to be set vp in euery house, that the grieuousnesse of those sinnes may be both remembred, and auoyded, whereby the hatred of them may possesse the heart of euery Christian / [by] Iohn Taylor.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
publisher: By Eliz. Allde for Henry Gosson, and are to be sold at his shop vpon London Bridge,
